title: A is for Apple
content: A a-pple. Can you say 'a'? Apple starts with 'A'.
visual_idea: Big blue letter 'A' with a simple apple drawing.
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: B is for Ball
content: B b-all. Bounce the ball! Can you name another 'B' word?
visual_idea: Large blue 'B' and a ball bouncing.
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: C is for Cat
content: C c-at. Cat says 'meow'. Can you think of a word that rhymes with 'cat'?
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: D is for Dog
content: D d-og. Dog says 'woof'. Can you bark like a dog?
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: E is for Elephant
content: E e-le-fant. Elephant is big! Can you stretch like an elephant?
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: F is for Fish
content: F f-ish. Fish swim fast! Can you make a fish face?
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: G is for Goat
content: G g-oat. Goat goes 'maa'. Can you say 'maa'?
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: H is for Hat
content: H h-at. Put on your hat! Can you name another thing you wear?
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: I is for Ice
content: I i-ce. Ice is cold! Can you shiver like ice?
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: J is for Jump
content: J j-ump. Jump up high! Can you jump three times?
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: K is for Kite
content: K k-ite. Kite flies in the sky! Can you draw a kite?
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: L is for Lion
content: L l-ion. Lion roars! Can you roar like a lion?
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: M is for Moon
content: M m-oon. Moon glows at night! Can you find another word starting with 'M'?
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: N is for Nest
content: N n-est. Birds build nests! Can you name a bird?
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: O is for Owl
content: O o-wl. Owl says 'hoo'. Can you say 'hoo'?
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: P is for Pig
content: P p-ig. Pig says 'oink'. Can you oink like a pig?
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: Q is for Queen
content: Q q-ueen. Queen wears a crown! Can you pretend to be a queen?
visual_idea: Blue 'Q' and a queen with a crown.
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: R is for Rainbow
content: R r-ain-bow. Rainbow has colors! Can you name a color?
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: S is for Sun
content: S s-un. Sun is bright! Can you shine like the sun?
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading

title: T is for Tree
content: T t-ree. Tree is tall! Can you stretch like a tree?
color_style: white background, blue border, blue heading
